long_description: When it turns misty and chilly, you'll be ready with Brooks Adapt Gloves II that morph to mittens. Flip over the lightweight, water-resistant windshields to protect your fingers from the weather. Polyester/spandex gloves fit snug and provide just the right amount of warmth for cool-day aerobic activities; comfortable stretch enhances comfort. Pull out the wind- and water-resistant windshields when it turns cold and windy; they stow inside small pockets on the gloves for quick deployment and so you won't lose them. Touch-screen-compatible index finger and thumb pads let you operate your smartphone. Terry fabric on the thumbs of the Brooks Adapt gloves II offers a convenient place to wipe your nose or sweat off your brow. Generous 3MScotchlite(TM) reflective detailing improves nighttime visibility.
